content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® f382 d e s i g n s t u d i o f r e e w i t h y a r n p u r c h a s e lace brim jeannee worsted chemo hat size child ladies materials 1- 50g ball of jeannee worsted 16 circular needle size us 6 set of double pointed needles size us 6 and 1 stitch marker gauge 5 sts = 1 over st st loosely cast on 80 90 sts onto circular needle place marker and join being careful not to twist the stitches round 1 purl round 2 * yarn over knit 3 slip 1 knit 2 together pass slipped stitch over knit 3 yarn over knit 1 repeat from * around round 3 purl round 4 * knit 1 yarn over knit 2 slip 1 knit 2 together pass slipped stitch over knit 2 yarn over knit 1 purl 1 repeat from * around round 5 * k9 p1 repeat from * around round 6 * knit 2 yarn over knit 1 slip 1 knit 2 together pass slipped stitch over knit 1 yarn over knit 2 purl 1 repeat from * around round 7 * k9 p1 repeat from * around round 8 * knit 3 yarn over slip 1 knit 2 together pass slipped stitch over yarn over knit 3 purl 1 repeat from * around change to st st and work in st st knit every round until total length is 5 6 ending at the marker begin decreasing on the following round as follows changing to double pointed needles when needed round 1 * knit 8 k2tog repeat from * around round 2 knit even round 3 * knit 7 k2tog repeat from * around round 4 knit even round 5 * knit 6 k2tog repeat from * around round 6 knit even round 7 * knit 5 k2tog repeat from * around round 8 * knit 4 k2tog repeat from * around round 9 * knit 3 k2tog repeat from * around round 10 * knit 2 k2tog repeat from * around round 11 * knit 1 k2tog repeat from * around round 12 * k2tog repeat from * around cut the yarn leaving a 12 tail thread it through the remaining stitches draw up tightly and secure weave in the ends ©2011 plymouth yarn company all rights reserved
